medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began this morning after an ERCP performed yesterday. The pain is sharp, located in the epigastric region, radiating down to the lower abdomen, and has not improved with Pepto-Bismol. Patient denies nausea, vomiting, or changes in stool, but has no appetite.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Coronary artery disease, transaminitis, hypertension, borderline diabetes mellitus, asthma, fibroid uterus, osteoarthritis.
medical_history.family_history: Extensive diabetes mellitus and coronary artery disease on father's side; BRCA on father's side.
